ygData.subject: Re: Ice Comet -Reply
ygData.msgSnippet: Ahah, Im pleased my posting caused so much debate! I guess I m just nostalgic for the old AD&D days when I got my 9th level spells at 18th level and bullied
ygData.messageBody:
Ahah,

Im pleased my posting caused so much debate! I guess I'm just nostalgic
for the old AD&D days when I got my 9th level spells at 18th level and
bullied all around me, even the Dungeon Master got scared of my 9th
level spells.

Seriously, Its important for the game that ridiculously high level
Wizards wield the most power. This is a fundemental aspect of our
understanding for the Wizard of popular myth.

As a character class We suffer enough for it.


Simon
